title: Fort Donelson National Battlefield: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Traveling Trunks Fort Donelson National Battlefield offers for your classroom and group a variety of traveling trunks intended to provide a unique hands-on opportunity for you and your students. These trunks were developed by the talented Park Rangers at Fort Donelson plus teachers and educators from across the region. We are grateful for their support. Please call (931) 232-5706, ext. 116, for more information. All Traveling Trunks   Traveling Trunks: An Experience in a Box!    Traveling Trunks at Fort Donelson Learn More     Curriculum Materials Fort Donelson National Battlefield and Fort Donelson National Cemetery welcomes you and your students to this very special place. At Fort Donelson you can learn about this most important February, 1862, battle, about some of the people involved in this battle...and about some of the beautiful flora, fauna, and other wildlife that calls Fort Donelson home. All Curriculum Materials   Materials for Your Classroom     Some Unique and Special Tools for Your Use Learn More     Materials to Loan Fort Donelson National Battlefield can provide you with a variety of materials to help you with your pre-visit activities. A free brief DVD, entitled "Fort Donelson: A Place for Heroes" is specially designed for students, and shares personal stories of those associated with the February, 1862, battle.
